Hi Snaedis!
Thank you very much for the quick and informative answer! That would be great! We have a use-case where we leverage a HubDB to allow to group blog tags within an additional level of categories. It is currently a bit bloated with all the HubDBs for language variants, etc.
So it would be great to be able to use this new functionality or even better => if blog tags would get one extra level of depth :slightly_smiling_face:

> if blog tags would get one extra level of depth
I like that! And I’ve heard this before. I’ll make sure we keep it in mind as we plan for future updates to the blog tool.
